üö®¬†We‚Äôre hiring a Product Manager at Carrum!¬†üö®
Hey folks! I‚Äôm looking for a¬†PM with 2+ years of Product experience, ideally someone who's worked at startups and knows what building from scratch really looks like. My ideal candidate brings:

1. User research: Not ‚Äúwe sent a survey‚Äù but ‚ÄúI spent 3 days shadowing users and found insights that changed the roadmap‚Äù
2. Data analytics: Defining KPIs, digging for insights, and yes, writing your own queries
3. MVP mindset: Can spin up MVPs with¬†Google Sheets, Notion, Zapier, or duct tape - and has actually shipped them
4. Team management: Lead APMs and align tech, design, ops, and marketing without losing your mind (No, you won‚Äôt make PPTs or manage JIRA. We're too busy building.)

Who is¬†not¬†my PM:
1. You‚Äôve never worked in/with startups
2. You‚Äôve only been a scrum master for tasks handed over by manager/business team
3. You‚Äôre a fresher (we love the young mind energy, but this role needs battle experience)

If this sounds like you or someone you‚Äôd bet on, apply here: https://lnkd.in/gx49aYNK

Note: If your profile is shortlisted, you‚Äôll receive an Ai interview link via email as Round 1 - the interviewer will be an Ai agent.

About Carrum: We‚Äôre a¬†14-month-old startup¬†that‚Äôs already scaled to a¬†‚Çπ250 Cr+ annualised revenue run rate,¬†profitably. We‚Äôre a¬†small team (yes, we hate PPTs too) doing big things with¬†real users, real scale, and real profits.
